pages.text: $(bgreen)Pea Gun$() is a range-attack plant weapon that can fire peas. Right-click it in the $(l)off hand$() to open the backpack, in the $(l)main hand$() to fire peas, and $(l)it can also be worn on the head and fired automatically$().It comes with a $(#ff0000)27-cell ammunition backpack for peas and a card slot$(), which is used to put plant cards to $(l)control the shooting mode$() of Pea Gun.

The level of the plant card on the card slot determines the type of peas that can be fired $(l)(normal peas, big peas, huge peas)$(). The final fire type is related to the playerâ€™s $(#ff0000)Tree Level$(). $(l)The higher the level, the higher the probability of the big peas and huge peas$(). At the same time, $(l)the higher the tree Level, the shorter the cooldown of Pea Gun$().

$(l)Pea Gun$() can be enchanted, currently it can enchant $(#ff0000)power and infinity$(). For power enchantment, it will $(l)slightly increase the initial damage$() of Pea. For infinite enchantment, it does not like bows, but there is a $(l)probability that it will not consume peas$(). This probability is also affected by the $(#ff0000)Tree Level$().

pages.title: Pea Gun Recipe
pages.text: The recipe of Pea Gun is relatively easy, only $(l)four peas, a dispenser and four Appease Essences$() are needed.

pages.title: PeaShooter Mode
pages.text: normal shoot style, shoot forward one pea at a time

pages.title: SnowPea Mode
pages.text: normal shoot style, $(l)no matter what kind of pea is in the ammunition backpack, the final shot out is $(#ff0000)snow peas$().

pages.title: Repeater Mode
pages.text: shoot forward two peas at a time

pages.title: ThreePeater Mode
pages.text: shoot three parallel peas forward at a time

pages.title: SplitPea Mode
pages.text: shoot forward one peas and shoot backward two peas at a time

pages.title: GatlingPea Mode
pages.text: shoot forward four peas at a time
